entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Convention Authorization when pages folder in different assembly #54145
  • Incorrect usage of `ObjectDisposedException.ThrowIf` in #54143
  • Perf regression: caching #54141
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, plainTextSansFilter #54140
  • [build.ps1] "-All" is poorly named #54138
    Backlog
  • Authenticate Blazor WASM App Using Identity Server 3 #54136
  • sending message from hubcontext not working. #54135
  • Howto : .Net8 OIDC authenticated (Azure) SignalR with Blazor Server #54134
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication --> Microsoft.Extensions.Authentication #54132
  • Inconsistent Form model-binding behaviour whether an `IFormFileCollection` property exists or not. #54130
  • Perf regression: plaintext, single_query #54129

Closed

  • [Blazor] Enhance form and data-permanent is not enough control. #54117
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #54103
  • Perf regression: fortunes, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter, single_query #54123
  • Perf regression: fortunes #54125
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot #54104
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #54099
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot #54078
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #54065
  • [build.ps1] "-All #54137
  • Helix OSX - Playwright ERR_CERT_DATABASE_CHANGED failures Individual Auth #30825
    9.0-preview3
  • Playwright based BlazorTemplates.Tests skipped on helix #38818
    9.0-preview3
  • Speed up ILEmitTrie jump table using Binary Search Tree #52812
    9.0-preview2
  • Blazor server exception while running locally #54111
  • Add a way to control DOM update timing to Blazor Enhanced Navigation #54128
  • Perf improvement: mvc #54121
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #54122

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Incorrect usage of the `ObjectDisposedException.ThrowIf` #54144
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [release/6.0] Update Nuget dependencies #54142
    tell-mode, 6.0.x

Merged

  • update Nuget.Protocol version #54139
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview2
  • [main] Improve Blazor project template #54048
    area-mvc, 9.0-preview2
  • Speed up ILEmitTrie jump table using Binary Search Tree #52928
    community-contribution, area-routing, 9.0-preview2

Updated

  • Enable unified build #54084
    area-infrastructure
  • Improved Server Addresses Collection Debugging #54120
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Add analyzer for custom IProblemDetailsWriter registration #49286
    area-mvc, analyzer, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Disable buffering of Blazor streaming responses #53929
    area-blazor
  • [release/8.0] Disable buffering of Blazor streaming responses #53930
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • Add IRateLimiterStatisticsFeature with default implementation and tests #46028
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4872968` to `b75ecf1` #53983
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4872968` to `b75ecf1` #53984
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4872968` to `b75ecf1` #53985
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 6.0.x
  • [Infrastructure] Add a github workflow to update NPM dependencies #54000
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • Treating empty string in form post as null for nullable value types #52499
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • Supporting pseudo-element attribute in css link fallback (#38146) #51396
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add attributes to SignalR source generator #38025
    area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun
  • #52067 input number range type #52747
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add AdditionalAuthorizationParameters to OAuthOptions/OpenIdConnectOptions #54119
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Change nullability annotation of HostString.Value to explictly allow null #53568
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Simplify redis cache setup #49722
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Simplify and optimize async parameters in RequestDelegateFactory #42588
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Improve pfx support for CertificateConfigLoader #43719
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Remove default logging scope from ASP.NET Core #44873
    breaking-change, pending-ci-rerun, needs-breaking-change-announcement, area-networking
  • Try Adding Support for XForwardedPort #50338
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Retry stateful reconnect attempts #50745
    area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fix script tag insertion in DomMerging #51184
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • SignOutHttpResult/SignOutResult ctor overloads that take a single authentication scheme #51220
    area-auth, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Use IProblemDetailService in ValidationProblem #51464
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [release/8.0] Pass dotnetEfVersion in Helix test runner #52103
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • Pass dotnetEfVersion in Helix test runner #52104
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • Make ValueStopwatch readonly #52496
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Add ShortCircuitAttribute #52571
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Add endpoint metadata to developer exception page #52668
    feature-diagnostics, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Set IExceptionHandlerFeature on DeveloperExceptionPageMiddleware #52688
    feature-diagnostics, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Populate the ValidIssuer and the ValidAudience properties of the JwtBearerOptions.TokenValidationParameters. #52821
    area-auth, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • JSInterop: Enable returning null for a nullable value type #52908
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add explicit null checks on ObjectPool.Return rather than triggering random failures later on #52935
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Avoid call to ASCII.GetBytes during HostFilteringMiddleware static initialization #52978
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Harden SignatureEquals nullability checks #53052
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Use cached ILogger instances to avoid repeated creation of these instances #53200
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Added a null check in ResolveHasInvalidAntiforgeryValidationFeature() #53208
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Prevent NRE in ExternalLogin.razor #53222
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • Better implementation of EventCallback.Equals #53395
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Update OAuthHandler.cs #53762
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-security
